TEXT_DICT.This: Contains pairs of Strings, used to get values based on keys.

TEXT_DICT.includeEventRelics: Include Event Relics in Custom Start
TEXT_DICT.includeStatusCards: Include Status Cards in Custom Start
TEXT_DICT.includeCurseCards: Include Curse Cards in Custom Start
TEXT_DICT.divaRhythmGlow: Make cards that'll trigger Rhythm glow
TEXT_DICT.showPowerTotals: Show the total damage or healing dealt by a given power
TEXT_DICT.quickPlayCards: Auto select targets for TiS cards where applicable
